chatbot.model

Class Chatbot

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatbot.model.Chatbot

  • public class Chatbot
extends java.lang.Object
    The chatbot model class. Used for checking and manipulating Strings.
    Version:
    1.2 10/09/14
    Author:
    erob7388

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int chatCount
      The amount of chats that have occurred, with the exception of blank entries.
      private java.lang.String contentArea
      The programmer specified content area for the contentChecker method.

      The programmer supplied list of memes.
      private ChatbotUser myUser
      The current user of the Chatbot object
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the Chatbot.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> userInputList
      The list of user input for the Chatbot.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Chatbot(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a ChatBot object with the supplied name and initializes the current number of chats to zero.

      • quitChecker

        public boolean quitChecker(java.lang.String input)
        Tells the program to quit only if the text box result = 'sayonara' (Case insensitive)
        Parameters:
        input - If input not equals 'sayonara' then will not quit.
        Returns:
        If input = sayonara, then it will quit the program.
